## zelos.PathObject class

An object that handles creating and setting each of the SVG elements used by the renderer.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class PathObject extends BasePathObject 
```
**Extends:** [BasePathObject](./blockly.blockrendering.pathobject.md)

|  [outputShapeType](./blockly.zelos.pathobject.outputshapetype.md) |  | number \| null | The type of block's output connection shape. This is set when a block with an output connection is drawn. |
